model.agent
Interface AgentViewable

All Known Subinterfaces:
AgentMutable
All Known Implementing Classes:
Agent, EmptyAgent, IndexAgent, MenuAgent, MobileIndexAgent, NormalIndexAgent, SearchAgent, StatsAgent
public interface AgentViewable

This interface must be implemented by every agent to provide a number of getters

generateDetailsPaneContent

void generateDetailsPaneContent(HtmlDetailsPaneContentGenerator detailsPane,
                                java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> params)

Parameters:

params - the request parameters

generateMapContent

generateMapBalloonContent

void generateMapBalloonContent(HtmlMapBalloonContentGenerator balloonContent,
                               java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> params)
Adds the content of a information balloon associated with a map marker, to be shown on the map when the maker is clicked. This method should be overridden by agents requiring their own custom balloon.

Parameters:
balloonContent - the generator
params - the request parameters
